Name: Welcome To... Chichester 0 : Preview
About the game: STORY When the self-proclaimed 'best secret agent in the world' starts his week-long holiday, he is anticipation nothing more than a simple hiking holiday with a grizzled guide up an unnamed mountain. Unfortunately for him, his enemies decided that would be far too boring... DETAILS This is a very short, comedic TEST visual novel, designed as a test for both writing visual novels (originally with VN Maker and then Ren'Py) and dealing with Steamworks, as well as being used as a testbed for anything new. Features include : Visit Chichester (not personally though) The ability to give your character a name! Wow! Comedy Quirky characters Internal and Steam achievements Spanish and Italian language support (minus a few small things). This has been provided by Daniele Ferrari (daniele.ferrari1994@yahoo.it) Non-tested Mac version included Features music by Kevin MacLeod (Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0) and some graphics from Pexels, as well as the standard characters from Visual Novel Maker Characters Grendel Jinx Lorinda Ella Hotel Receptionist
